mapper.select: SELECT motorcycleID, brand, model, years, replica, cruiser, tourer, adventure, multiPurpose, naked, scrambler, offRoad, motard, scooter, classic, cafe_racer, price, wheelbase, seat_height, wet_weight, fuel_capacity, ground_clearance, dry_weight, length, width, height, front_tyre_width, front_tyre_aspect_ratio, front_tyre_structure, front_tyre_diameter, rear_tyre_width, rear_tyre_aspect_ratio, rear_tyre_structure, rear_tyre_diameter, front_brake_disc_count, front_brake_disc_size, front_brake_disc_type, front_brake_piston_count, rear_brake_disc_size, rear_brake_disc_type, rear_brake_piston_count, frame_type, frame_material, start_system, abs, tcs, cruise_control, assist_slipper_clutch, electric_screen, clutch_assist_system, imu, cornering_abs, wheelie_control, riding_mode_change, banking_angle_display, abs_level_control, quickshift_up, quickshift_up_down, capacity, bore_stroke, compression_ratio, cooling_system, lubrication, fuel_system, emission, induction, mileage, top_speed, clutch, transmission_gear_count, transmission_type, engine_stroke, engine_cylinder, engine_camshaft, engine_type, engine_crank_angle, max_power_hp, max_power_rpm, max_torque_nm, max_torque_rpm, classGrade FROM MotorcycleAll WHERE motorcycleID = #{motorcycleID}

SELECT motorcycleID, brand, model, years, replica, cruiser, tourer, adventure, multiPurpose, naked, scrambler, offRoad, motard, scooter, classic, cafe_racer, price, wheelbase, seat_height, wet_weight, fuel_capacity, ground_clearance, dry_weight, length, width, height, front_tyre_width, front_tyre_aspect_ratio, front_tyre_structure, front_tyre_diameter, rear_tyre_width, rear_tyre_aspect_ratio, rear_tyre_structure, rear_tyre_diameter, front_brake_disc_count, front_brake_disc_size, front_brake_disc_type, front_brake_piston_count, rear_brake_disc_size, rear_brake_disc_type, rear_brake_piston_count, frame_type, frame_material, start_system, abs, tcs, cruise_control, assist_slipper_clutch, electric_screen, clutch_assist_system, imu, cornering_abs, wheelie_control, riding_mode_change, banking_angle_display, abs_level_control, quickshift_up, quickshift_up_down, capacity, bore_stroke, compression_ratio, cooling_system, lubrication, fuel_system, emission, induction, mileage, top_speed, clutch, transmission_gear_count, transmission_type, engine_stroke, engine_cylinder, engine_camshaft, engine_type, engine_crank_angle, max_power_hp, max_power_rpm, max_torque_nm, max_torque_rpm, classGrade FROM MotorcycleAll ORDER BY brand, model
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MotorcycleAll (brand, model, years, replica, cruiser, tourer, adventure, multiPurpose, naked, scrambler, offRoad, motard, scooter, classic, cafe_racer, price, wheelbase, seat_height, wet_weight, fuel_capacity, ground_clearance, dry_weight, length, width, height, front_tyre_width, front_tyre_aspect_ratio, front_tyre_structure, front_tyre_diameter, rear_tyre_width, rear_tyre_aspect_ratio, rear_tyre_structure, rear_tyre_diameter, front_brake_disc_count, front_brake_disc_size, front_brake_disc_type, front_brake_piston_count, rear_brake_disc_size, rear_brake_disc_type, rear_brake_piston_count, frame_type, frame_material, start_system, abs, tcs, cruise_control, assist_slipper_clutch, electric_screen, clutch_assist_system, imu, cornering_abs, wheelie_control, riding_mode_change, banking_angle_display, abs_level_control, quickshift_up, quickshift_up_down , capacity, bore_stroke, compression_ratio, cooling_system, lubrication, fuel_system, emission, induction, mileage, top_speed, clutch, transmission_gear_count, transmission_type, engine_stroke, engine_cylinder, engine_camshaft, engine_type, engine_crank_angle, max_power_hp, max_power_rpm, max_torque_nm, max_torque_rpm, classGrade) VALUES (#{brand}, #{model}, #{years}, #{replica}, #{cruiser}, #{tourer}, #{adventure}, #{multiPurpose}, #{naked}, #{scrambler}, #{offRoad}, #{motard}, #{scooter}, #{classic}, #{cafeRacer}, #{price}, #{wheelbase}, #{seatHeight}, #{wetWeight}, #{fuelCapacity}, #{groundClearance}, #{dryWeight}, #{length}, #{width}, #{height}, #{frontTyreWidth}, #{frontTyreAspectRatio}, #{frontTyreStructure}, #{frontTyreDiameter}, #{rearTyreWidth}, #{rearTyreAspectRatio}, #{rearTyreStructure}, #{rearTyreDiameter}, #{frontBrakeDiscCount}, #{frontBrakeDiscSize}, #{frontBrakeDiscType}, #{frontBrakePistonCount}, #{rearBrakeDiscSize}, #{rearBrakeDiscType}, #{rearBrakePistonCount}, #{frameType}, #{frameMaterial}, #{startSystem}, #{abs}, #{tcs}, #{cruiseControl}, #{assistSlipperClutch}, #{electricScreen}, #{clutchAssistSystem}, #{imu}, #{corneringAbs}, #{wheelieControl}, #{ridingModeChange}, #{bankingAngleDisplay}, #{absLevelControl}, #{quickshiftUp}, #{quickshiftUpDown}, #{capacity}, #{boreStroke}, #{compressionRatio}, #{coolingSystem}, #{lubrication}, #{fuelSystem}, #{emission}, #{induction}, #{mileage}, #{topSpeed}, #{clutch}, #{transmissionGearCount}, #{transmissionType}, #{engineStroke}, #{engineCylinder}, #{engineCamshaft}, #{engineType}, #{engineCrankAngle}, #{maxPowerHp}, #{maxPowerRpm}, #{maxTorqueNm}, #{maxTorqueRpm}, #{classGrade})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT brand FROM MotorcycleAll ORDER BY brand
SELECT model FROM MotorcycleAll WHERE brand = #{brand} ORDER BY model

SELECT *, (CASE WHEN ( price IS NOT NULL AND price <= #{price} AND capacity IS NOT NULL AND capacity BETWEEN #{minCapacity} AND #{maxCapacity} AND top_speed IS NOT NULL AND top_speed BETWEEN #{minSpeed} AND #{maxSpeed} AND (max_power_rpm IS NOT NULL AND max_torque_rpm IS NOT NULL) AND (max_power_rpm BETWEEN #{minRpm} AND #{maxRpm} OR max_torque_rpm BETWEEN #{minRpm} AND #{maxRpm}) AND 1=1 ) THEN 'EXACT' WHEN ( price IS NOT NULL AND price <= #{price} * 1.2 AND capacity IS NOT NULL AND capacity BETWEEN #{minCapacity} * 0.8 AND #{maxCapacity} * 1.2 AND top_speed IS NOT NULL AND top_speed BETWEEN #{minSpeed} * 0.8 AND #{maxSpeed} * 1.2 AND (max_power_rpm IS NOT NULL AND max_torque_rpm IS NOT NULL) AND (max_power_rpm BETWEEN #{minRpm} * 0.8 AND #{maxRpm} * 1.2 OR max_torque_rpm BETWEEN #{minRpm} * 0.8 AND #{maxRpm} * 1.2) AND 1=1 ) THEN 'MEDIUM' WHEN ( price IS NOT NULL AND price <= #{price} * 1.3 AND capacity IS NOT NULL AND capacity BETWEEN #{minCapacity} * 0.7 AND #{maxCapacity} * 1.3 AND top_speed IS NOT NULL AND top_speed BETWEEN #{minSpeed} * 0.7 AND #{maxSpeed} * 1.3 AND (max_power_rpm IS NOT NULL AND max_torque_rpm IS NOT NULL) AND (max_power_rpm BETWEEN #{minRpm} * 0.7 AND #{maxRpm} * 1.3 OR max_torque_rpm BETWEEN #{minRpm} * 0.7 AND #{maxRpm} * 1.3) AND 1=1 ) THEN 'WIDE' ELSE 'NONE' END) as match_range FROM MotorcycleAll WHERE 1=1
AND ( CASE #{primaryGenre} WHEN 'replica' THEN replica IS NOT NULL AND replica > 1 WHEN 'cruiser' THEN cruiser IS NOT NULL AND cruiser > 1 WHEN 'tourer' THEN tourer IS NOT NULL AND tourer > 1 WHEN 'adventure' THEN adventure IS NOT NULL AND adventure > 1 WHEN 'multiPurpose' THEN multiPurpose IS NOT NULL AND multiPurpose > 1 WHEN 'naked' THEN naked IS NOT NULL AND naked > 1 WHEN 'classic' THEN classic IS NOT NULL AND classic > 1 WHEN 'scrambler' THEN scrambler IS NOT NULL AND scrambler > 1 WHEN 'offRoad' THEN offRoad IS NOT NULL AND offRoad > 1 WHEN 'motard' THEN motard IS NOT NULL AND motard > 1 WHEN 'scooter' THEN scooter IS NOT NULL AND scooter > 1 WHEN 'cafeRacer' THEN cafe_racer IS NOT NULL AND cafe_racer > 1 ELSE 1=1 END )
AND classGrade IS NOT NULL AND classGrade IN
#{grade}
AND ( price IS NOT NULL AND price <= #{price} * 1.3 AND capacity IS NOT NULL AND capacity BETWEEN #{minCapacity} * 0.7 AND #{maxCapacity} * 1.3 AND top_speed IS NOT NULL AND top_speed BETWEEN #{minSpeed} * 0.7 AND #{maxSpeed} * 1.3 AND (max_power_rpm IS NOT NULL AND max_torque_rpm IS NOT NULL) AND (max_power_rpm BETWEEN #{minRpm} * 0.7 AND #{maxRpm} * 1.3 OR max_torque_rpm BETWEEN #{minRpm} * 0.7 AND #{maxRpm} * 1.3) AND 1=1 ) ORDER BY CASE match_range WHEN 'EXACT' THEN 1 WHEN 'MEDIUM' THEN 2 WHEN 'WIDE' THEN 3 ELSE 4 END, motorcycleID
